text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: But, I'm still in the race!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: I'm still in the middle of running towards the 3600m goal!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: With the momentum from the Hakodate Sprint Stakes, I'll go on to win the CBC Sho!
